detectors.description:
BluzelleRewards.notifyRewardAmount(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BluzelleRewards__1.sol#698-713) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-rewardRate = reward.div(DURATION) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BluzelleRewards__1.sol#704)
	-leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BluzelleRewards__1.sol#707)
detectors.markdown:
[BluzelleRewards.notifyRewardAmount(uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BluzelleRewards__1.sol#L698-L713) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-[rewardRate = reward.div(DURATION)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BluzelleRewards__1.sol#L704)
	-[leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BluzelleRewards__1.sol#L707)

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in BluzelleRewards.exit() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BluzelleRewards__1.sol#684-687):
	External calls:
	- withdraw(balanceOf(msg.sender)) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BluzelleRewards__1.sol#685)
		- bpt.safeTransfer(msg.sender,amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BluzelleRewards__1.sol#615)
		- (success,returndata) = address(token).call(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BluzelleRewards__1.sol#553)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BluzelleRewards__1.sol#686)
		- blz.safeTransfer(msg.sender,reward) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BluzelleRewards__1.sol#693)
		- (success,returndata) = address(token).call(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BluzelleRewards__1.sol#553)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BluzelleRewards__1.sol#686)
		- lastUpdateTime = lastTimeRewardApplicable() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BluzelleRewards__1.sol#637)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BluzelleRewards__1.sol#686)
		- rewardPerTokenStored = rewardPerToken() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BluzelleRewards__1.sol#636)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BluzelleRewards__1.sol#686)
		- rewards[msg.sender] = 0 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BluzelleRewards__1.sol#692)
		- rewards[account] = earned(account) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BluzelleRewards__1.sol#639)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BluzelleRewards__1.sol#686)
		- userRewardPerTokenPaid[account] = rewardPerTokenStored (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BluzelleRewards__1.sol#640)
